messages.subject: Re: the article written by J. Berry
messages.msgSnippet: After reading the article, how are supposed to calmly educate this man??? I have a few other ideas in mind, but none of them include being calm! Does this
messages.messageBody:
After reading the article, how are supposed to 'calmly' educate this man??? I
have a few other ideas in mind, but none of them include being calm! Does this
man hold any office or anything of the sort? If so, he should be kicked out!
What we do with OUR kids is OUR business, as long as we aren't hurting them
and are working towards bettering thier lives! At least we care enough not to
subject our kids to the ridicule we got in ps!
Highly annoyed at that man,
Tanya
Tanya in WA (state)



---SENT FROM A FREE INTERNET AND EMAIL ACCOUNT FROM WWW.FREEi.NET!---
